channel.title: Emacs on ppalazon
channel.description: Recent content in Emacs on ppalazon

item.title: First post from ox-hugo
item.description: This is my first export from ox-hugo I’m using One post per Org subtree for posts with org-mode. Figure 1: One post per Org subtree snapshot Reference Please visit ox-hugo github page or ox-hugo website. There is a ox-hugo test website where you can learn how to configure your documents

item.title: My org mode configuration
item.description: Table of Contents Personal org-mode configuration This is my personal list with most used commands on org-mode. It’s contains snippets, shortcuts and configurations. Personal org-mode configuration (require 'package) (add-to-list 'package-archives '("org" . "https://orgmode.org/elpa/") t) (require 'org) ;; Enabled ox-hugo (with-eval-after-load 'ox (require 'ox-hugo)) ;; Configuration of org-mode (setq org-startup-indented t) (setq org-startup-folded "showall") (setq org-directory "~/org") (setq org-capture-directory (concat org-directory "/capture")) (setq org-publish-directory (concat org-directory "/publish")) (setq org-ref-directory (concat org-directory "/ref")) (setq org-default-notes-file (concat org-capture-directory "/notes.

item.title: Testing ox-hugo
item.description: This is a test for ox-hugo exports LaTeX formatted equation: \( E = -J \sum_{i=1}^N s_i s_{i+1} \) If \(a^2=b\) and \( b=2 \), then the solution must be either \[ a=+\sqrt{2} \] or \[ a=-\sqrt{2} \] \begin{equation} \label{eq:1} C = W\log_{2} (1+\mathrm{SNR}) \end{equation} sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get dist-upgrade (require 'org)
